messages.title: Why we are voting Scottish Conservative and Unionist this time ...
messages.content: I never believed the day would come, but in this election I will be voting Scottish Conservative and Unionist to protect the country I love. Even if it's only this one time, your vote, and mine, for the Scottish Conservatives on 12th December can safeguard our country by stopping both Corbyn and Sturgeon.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Voting for the Scottish Conservatives will prevent another divisive referendum and stop Indyref2.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Across Scotland, Labour and the Lib Dems have collapsed. I voted Remain, and I used to vote Labour, but on 12th December and I'm backing the Scottish Conservatives. They are the only Party that can stand up to Nicola Sturgeon at this election.

community.content: Voting for the Scottish Conservatives will prevent another divisive referendum and stop Indyref2.

endorsements.endorser: Tom Harris, former Labour MP for Glasgow South
endorsements.endorsement: I never believed the day would come, but in this election I will be voting Scottish Conservative and Unionist to protect the country I love. Even if it's only this one time, your vote, and mine, for the Scottish Conservatives on 12th December can safeguard our country by stopping both Corbyn and Sturgeon.

endorsements.endorser: Jennifer Stewart, former Liberal Democrat councillor in Aberdeen
endorsements.endorsement: This election will be dominated by independence and only a vote for the Scottish Conservatives will show that we do not want another divisive referendum.

endorsements.endorser: Mike Barnacle, former Lib Dem councillor - now independent
endorsements.endorsement: As a former Liberal Democrat and current Independent local councillor for Kinross-shire, I'm voting for the Scottish Conservatives. I am completely opposed to the breakup of the UK sought by the SNP in holding yet another divisive referendum.

endorsements.endorser: Yvonne McNeill, former Labour councillor in Inverclyde
endorsements.endorsement: Across Scotland, Labour and the Lib Dems have collapsed. I voted Remain, and I used to vote Labour, but on 12th December and I'm backing the Scottish Conservatives. They are the only Party that can stand up to Nicola Sturgeon at this election.

endorsements.endorser: Gordon Macdonald, former Lib Dem councillor in East Dunbartonshire
endorsements.endorsement: I was a Lib Dem councillor in Jo Swinson's constituency, but I'm backing the Scottish Conservatives. The Scottish Conservatives are the only Party that can be trusted to stand up to Nicola Sturgeon and stop IndyRef2.

examples: I never believed the day would come, but in this election I will be voting Scottish Conservative and Unionist to protect the country I love.
Even if it's only this one time, your vote, and mine, for the Scottish Conservatives on 12th December can safeguard our country by stopping both Corbyn and Sturgeon.
This election will be dominated by independence and only a vote for the Scottish Conservatives will show that we do not want another divisive referendum.
I am completely opposed to the breakup of the UK sought by the SNP in holding yet another divisive referendum.

Across Scotland, Labour and the Lib Dems have collapsed. I voted Remain, and I used to vote Labour, but on 12th December and I'm backing the Scottish Conservatives. They are the only Party that can stand up to Nicola Sturgeon at this election.
Voting for the Scottish Conservatives will prevent another divisive referendum and stop Indyref2.

personalStories.story: As a former Liberal Democrat and current Independent local councillor for Kinross-shire, I'm voting for the Scottish Conservatives. I am completely opposed to the breakup of the UK sought by the SNP in holding yet another divisive referendum.

Across Scotland, Labour and the Lib Dems have collapsed. I voted Remain, and I used to vote Labour, but on 12th December and I'm backing the Scottish Conservatives. They are the only Party that can stand up to Nicola Sturgeon at this election.

Even if it's only this one time, your vote, and mine, for the Scottish Conservatives on 12th December can safeguard our country by stopping both Corbyn and Sturgeon.
